summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5727 for the improvement of Angeline Street, from Rainier Avenue to 39th Avenue South; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75634 as amended by Ordinances Nos. 76831 and 77143, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
